title: Charming Historic Loft Immersed in Greenery, Ideal for Creatives
description: Step inside this unique 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom loft offering 138 sqm of beautifully preserved historic character. High ceilings and exposed beams are paired with modern energy-efficient windows to complement spacious, airy interiors filled with light. Thoughtfully equipped with a rainwater collection system, and access to a dedicated children's playground area, it's perfect for families desiring sustainability as well as style.
neighborhood_description: Set in the tranquil Suburb neighborhood of Pila, this property enjoys verdant, wide-open spaces and a welcoming, pet-friendly community reminiscent of artists’ retreats in the countryside. It's ideal for those seeking creative inspiration surrounded by nature, yet offers swift highway access for convenient travel. Walks among tree-lined lanes or picnics in local parks are part of daily life here.
target_buyer: This residence is tailored for creative professionals, artists, or families seeking space to inspire and unwind. Those longing for a tranquil, nature-rich atmosphere while desiring practical living comforts—and a nod to history—will find this loft perfect.
market_positioning: Distinctive among similar listings in Pila, this boardwalk-adjacent loft offers rare historic atmosphere with sustainability features, which appeals to buyers looking for character homes removed from busy city life yet still conveniently connected via the highway.
